title: [16.9] ClickOnce publish does not publish certain runtime references in the correct destination folder
body: Port of #5885 to point to master.

commit.message:
Ensure references comming from nuget pkg that have a destination sub-dir specfied get published into the sub-dir and not in the root of the publish directory

Update MS.Common.CurrentVersion.targets to handle runtime assets that are not being picked up for publish
Check if files  are duplicated in References and Files group and ignore the second copy in Files
